summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 FORD FIVE HUNDRED.  THE INSTRUMENT PANEL WOULD FLICKER ON AND OFF WHEN THE HEADLIGHTS WERE ACTIVATED.  A FEW DAYS LATER, THE INSTRUMENT PANEL FAILED COMPLETELY.  THE DEALER STATED THAT THE INSTRUMENT CLUSTER NEEDED TO BE REPAIRED.  THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE 48,000.
